name: PONG PC
description:
New Update coming soon Practice Mode and Goal Mode (v9)

Experience the classic game of Pong on your PC.

With new Impossible mode you can play an opponent that cant be beat, use as practise or trick your friends into playing and never winning.

Aim of the game is to keep the ball in the game area not letting it past your paddle (left side paddle).

To score/get a point you must get the ball past the enemy paddle (right side paddle).

-------------------------------

Controls:

W,S/Up Arrow,Down Arrow -- Move Paddle Up/Down

Left Mouse Click -- Launch Ball

-------------------------------

Made with Unity

By Red Lemming Games
